thread.title: First Time MOH
thread.title_full: The House of Bachelorette reviewed by First Time MOH

author: First Time MOH
title: First Time MOH
text:
I have been searching for shirts, sashes, and mini-veils and every place I went was crazy expensive. This website has it all! Best of all not all of it has peckers which was fantastic because the bride had a strict no peckers rule. Also, when I bought all the shirts I had free gifts to choose from which helped with my decoration expenses.
When I placed the order I never got my invoice so I called in and got Excellent customer service that re emailed me my invoice immediately!
I am super impressed by this site, and highly encourage it.
